mapper.select: SELECT * FROM groupTbl g LEFT OUTER JOIN userTbl u ON u.uid = g.uid WHERE g.isDeleted = 0 AND (g.groupName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')) ORDER BY g.createdDate DESC

SELECT * FROM postTbl p LEFT OUTER JOIN userTbl u ON p.uid = u.uid LEFT OUTER JOIN groupTbl g ON g.groupId = p.groupId WHERE p.isDeleted = 0 AND g.isDeleted = 0 AND (p.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')) ORDER BY p.postedDate DESC

SELECT * FROM postTbl p LEFT OUTER JOIN userTbl u ON p.uid = u.uid LEFT OUTER JOIN groupTbl g ON g.groupId = p.groupId WHERE p.isDeleted = 0 AND g.isDeleted = 0 AND p.tag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') ORDER BY p.postedDate DESC

SELECT p.groupId, p.postId, REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX (SUBSTRING_INDEX(p.tag,'#',numbers.n),'#',-1), ' ', '') tag FROM ( SELECT 2 n UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 ) numbers INNER JOIN postTbl p ON CHAR_LENGTH( p.tag ) - CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(p.tag , '#' , ''))>= numbers.n - 1 ORDER BY p.postId desc
